metadata.title: CVE-2022-23303 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The implementations of SAE in hostapd before 2.10 and wpa_supplicant before2.10 are vulnerable to side channel attacks as a result of cache accesspatterns. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2019-9494.

criterions.comment: wpa package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
